this function is required on some platforms to initialize the atomic operation\textquotesingle{}s internal structures 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em p} & pool \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+S\+U\+C\+C\+E\+SS on successful completion 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\begin{DoxyRemark}{Remarks}
Programs do N\+OT need to call this directly. A\+PR will call this automatically from apr\+\_\+initialize. 
\end{DoxyRemark}
